title: Cheese and onion pie
description: This stunning vegetarian pie is perfect for a picnic or lunchbox and looks just as at home at the centre of the dinner table.
ingredients: 450g/1lb plain flour, plus extra for dusting
120g/4½oz unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing
50g/2oz parmesan cheese (or a similar vegetarian hard cheese), grated
1 medium potato, peeled and cut into cubes
salt and freshly ground black pepper
